title: Vegetarian London
name: Vegetarian London
description:
A Map by Joedonnachie

Places to eat, restaurants and other resources for London based or visiting vegetarians

properties.name: Beatroot Veggie Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie Beatroot is my favourite place to eat. It\'s cheap, it\'s cheerful, and it serves the best organic, vegetarian food in London. I\'ve introduced quite a few of my friends to this place and they\'ve all been very positive about it.

properties.name: Buddha Cafe, Vegetarian Cafe in Soho
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie 41 Lexington Street, London, W1F 9AJ

properties.name: Chi Vegan Noodle Bar
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie56 St. Martin\'s Lane, Covent Garden, London, WC2N 4ERAnother cheap and cheerful vegetarian oasis in Central London.

properties.name: Food For Thought
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie 31 Neal Street, London, WC2H 9PRAfter you\'ve sampled the lovely vegetarian food here you can explore the area with it\'s wealth of shops offering alternative health strategies.

properties.name: Govindas Vegetarian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie 10 Soho Street, London, W1D 3DLThis is the vegetarian restaurant at the north end of Soho Square run by the Hare Krishna dudes you see chanting and bell ringing along Oxford Street

properties.name: Mantra Vegetarian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie 48 Dean Street, London, W1D 5BFAtmospheric vegetarian restaurant noted for it\'s fusion experiments

properties.name: Maoz Vegetarian
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie43 Old Compton Street, London, W1D 6HGBright and shiny vegetarian restaurant right on Soho\'s Old Compton Street, the gay heart of London

properties.name: Mildred's, Vegetarian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie 45 Lexington Street, London, W1F 9ANNot the cheapest and the staff often look as if they\'d rather be elsewhere but popular with veggies and non-veggies alike

properties.name: Vitaorganic, Vegetarian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie I can\'t decide whether Vitaorganic or Beatroot is my favourite vegetarian eating place in Soho. I\'ll have to keep going back to each until I make up my mind

properties.name: World Food Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Joedonnachie  A vegetarian cafe in Neal\'s Yard, an area renowned for it\'s wealth of shops affering alternative health strategies.
